creator: brentlintner@apache.org
text:
Now that the project code is officially in (see https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=incubator-ripple.git;a=summary):

1. The old BlackBerry GitHub account need not be mentioned.

2. Ripple's main codebase is only in Apache GIT, and SVN only holds incubator site.
